challenge.title: Step 19
challenge.description: Now give the @keyframes wheel rule a 100% selector. Within that, set the transform to rotate(360deg). By doing this, your animation will now complete a full rotation.

tests.text: Your @keyframes wheel rule should have a 100% selector.
Your 100% selector should come after your 0% selector.
Your 100% selector should have a transform property set to rotate(360deg).
